name: Mousecare
description:
My giant human flatmate has been feeling down lately. He hasn't left his couch in days... I'm worried about him. Let's try and cheer him up together, shall we?

A 3D platformer crafted in 48h for the Global Game Jam 2022 by Stéphane Lévêque, Thomas Frick, Nicolas Gauthier, Eléa Héberlé, Timothée Lestradet, Oscar Garvin, Kieran Fitzpatrick, Elisée Maurer.

Using Godot Engine and Blender.
